headings.usage: Main headings, section titles, hero text. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

code.usage: Email headers, URLs, technical analysis data, risk scores.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Marketing, Mode B for Dashboard)
layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8, p-12 for sections. Gap-6 or Gap-8 for grids.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or small radius (4px). Magnetic hover effect.

cards.style: Flat background (#393E46) with subtle border (#4B5563). No shadow by default. Hover: Border color lightens.

inputs.style: bg-[#222831] border-[#4B5563] text-[#DFD0B8] focus:border-[#948979] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#948979]
inputs.height: h-12 or h-14 for main inputs

analysis_result.style: Dashboard style. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for scores. Use progress bars for risk levels.

animations.text_reveal: Staggered character or word reveal for hero text.
animations.magnetic: Button moves slightly towards cursor on hover.
animations.loader: Scanning line effect or decrypting text (random chars -> final text).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE tailwind.config.js with the colors provided in 'colors.tailwind_config'.
2. IMPORT fonts in index.css using the 'import_url'.
3. CREATE a 'Layout' component that wraps the app with the dark background (#222831) and text color (#DFD0B8).
4. BUILD the 'Hero' section with a large, bold heading using 'Outfit' font. Use the 'text_reveal' animation.
5. BUILD the 'AnalysisInput' component. It should look like a high-tech scanner. Use a large textarea with a monospace font.
6. BUILD the 'ResultsDashboard' component. Use a grid layout. Show the 'Risk Score' prominently.
9. DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
10. KEEP the design 'calm' and 'confident'. Avoid clutter.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
